title: Peanut-dressed noodle salad with carrot & herbs recipe | Waitrose

ingredients.item: 225g pack Mama Instant Rice Vermicelli Noodles
3 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Japanese Rice Vinegar
2 x 25g packs Thai basil, leaves only
½ x 100g pack mint, leaves only, roughly chopped
4 tbsp Cooks’ Ingredients Crispy Fried Onions

instructions.step: Prepare the noodles according to pack instructions. Drain and rinse under cold running water.
In a large bowl whisk the sesame oil, peanut butter, soy, vinegar, sugar, garlic and chilli together until well mixed. Add the noodles and toss gently to coat.
Using a vegetable peeler, cut the carrots into long, thin ribbons. Add to the noodles with all the herbs and toss again to combine well.
Tip onto a serving dish and scatter with the crispy onions and the peanuts before serving.
